movies.title: Matrix
movies.description: A hacker discovers the world is a simulation and joins a rebellion against its controllers.
movies.creator: The Wachowskis

movies.title: Inception
movies.description: A skilled thief, who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology, is given a chance to erase his criminal record.
movies.creator: Christopher Nolan

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.
movies.creator: Christopher Nolan

movies.title: Avatar
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine is dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission, but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.
movies.creator: James Cameron

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.description: A young hobbit, Frodo, is tasked with destroying an ancient, powerful ring before it falls into the hands of evil.
movies.creator: Peter Jackson

movies.title: Dune
movies.description: A noble family becomes embroiled in a war for control over the galaxy's most valuable asset, a drug known as 'spice'.
movies.creator: Denis Villeneuve

movies.title: Tenet
movies.description: A protagonist embarks on a twilight mission that unfolds in a world beyond real time.
movies.creator: Christopher Nolan

movies.title: The Irishman
movies.description: A mob hitman recalls his possible involvement with the slaying of Jimmy Hoffa.
movies.creator: Martin Scorsese

movies.title: Joker
movies.description: In Gotham City, mentally troubled comedian Arthur Fleck embarks on a downward spiral of social revolution and bloody crime.
movies.creator: Todd Phillips

movies.title: Parasite
movies.description: Greed and class discrimination threaten the newly formed symbiotic relationship between the wealthy Park family and the destitute Kim clan.
movies.creator: Bong Joon Ho

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: Batman battles the Joker in Gotham, fighting crime while dealing with personal loss.
movies.creator: Christopher Nolan

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.description: A former Roman general sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
movies.creator: Ridley Scott

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.description: An insomniac office worker forms an underground fight club that evolves into something much more.
movies.creator: David Fincher

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
movies.creator: Francis Ford Coppola

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
movies.creator: Quentin Tarantino

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
movies.creator: Steven Spielberg

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
movies.creator: Frank Darabont

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.description: Lion cub Simba struggles to accept the responsibilities of adulthood and his destiny as king.
movies.creator: Roger Allers & Rob Minkoff

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are going to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.creator: Joss Whedon

movies.title: The Matrix Reloaded
movies.description: Neo and his allies race against time before the machines breach Zion, while also attempting to unlock the secrets of the Matrix.
movies.creator: The Wachowskis

movies-recent.title: Spider-Man: No Way Home
movies-recent.description: With Spider-Man's identity now revealed, Peter asks Doctor Strange for help, but things become even more dangerous.
movies-recent.creator: Jon Watts

movies-recent.title: Dune: Part Two
movies-recent.description: Paul Atreides unites with the Fremen to exact revenge against the conspirators who destroyed his family.
movies-recent.creator: Denis Villeneuve

movies-recent.title: The Batman
movies-recent.description: Batman ventures into Gotham City's underworld when a sadistic killer leaves behind a trail of cryptic clues.
movies-recent.creator: Matt Reeves

movies-recent.title: Top Gun: Maverick
movies-recent.description: After more than thirty years of service, Maverick is still pushing the envelope as a top naval aviator.
movies-recent.creator: Joseph Kosinski

movies-recent.title: No Time to Die
movies-recent.description: James Bond has left active service. His peace is short-lived when an old friend from the CIA turns up asking for help.
movies-recent.creator: Cary Joji Fukunaga

movies-recent.title: Black Panther: Wakanda Forever
movies-recent.description: The people of Wakanda fight to protect their home from intervening world powers as they mourn the death of King T'Challa.
movies-recent.creator: Ryan Coogler

movies-recent.title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
movies-recent.description: Doctor Strange teams up with a mysterious teenage girl from his dreams to battle multiverse threats.
movies-recent.creator: Sam Raimi

movies-recent.title: Elvis
movies-recent.description: The life of American music icon Elvis Presley, from his childhood to becoming a rock and movie star.
movies-recent.creator: Baz Luhrmann

movies-recent.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
movies-recent.description: A middle-aged Chinese immigrant is swept up into an insane adventure where she alone can save existence.
movies-recent.creator: Daniel Kwan & Daniel Scheinert

movies-recent.title: The Fabelmans
movies-recent.description: Growing up in post-World War II era Arizona, young Sammy Fabelman falls in love with movies and starts making his own.
movies-recent.creator: Steven Spielberg
